definition: next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: The reaction of aluminium with water is secondary.
sentences.chinese: 鋁粉和水的反應是次要的。

sentences.english: Once the staging area is empty, secondary resumes normal operation.
sentences.chinese: 一旦暫存區域爲空，次要服務器就會恢復常規操作。

sentences.english: Other significant subplots include the adventures of Lydia, the youngest Bennet daughter.
sentences.chinese: 其它重要的次要情節包括班奈特家小女麗迪雅的冒險。

sentences.english: Three sub- cantonments shall be placed in the periphery of each of these main cantonments.
sentences.chinese: 三個次要營地應分佈在每一個主要營地的周圍。

sentences.english: That mous actor seemed content to play a minor part in the play.
sentences.chinese: 那位名演員似乎很樂意在劇中扮演一個次要角色。

sentences.english: The social aspects of religion are often the most subordinated to objective study.
sentences.chinese: 宗教的社會方面對客觀的研究來說經常是最次要的。

sentences.english: Meat is, at best, a secondary source of essential elements.
sentences.chinese: 肉類充其量不過是身體基本要素的次要來源。

sentences.english: What matters is the size of the office. The location is of secondary importance.
sentences.chinese: 關鍵是要看辦公室的大小，位置是次要的。

sentences.english: List all the major and minor plot points and do some writing about them.
sentences.chinese: 然後列出主要和次要的情節，並作做寫作練習。

sentences.english: Don't stress minor issues at the expense of the central task.
sentences.chinese: 不要因次要問題而沖淡了中心任務。

sentences.english: The pursuit of wealth is an all-consuming national passion, and everything else is subordinate to it.
sentences.chinese: 中國人現在正狂熱地追求財富，其他東西都是次要的。

sentences.english: Secondary trends are short-term changes in price direction against a primary trend.
sentences.chinese: 次要趨勢是短期的變化對價格方向的一個主要趨勢。

sentences.english: In fact, sugar is the second ingredient in the Krispies.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，在krispies中糖只是次要的成分。

sentences.english: Biotite is a subordinate constituent of the mafic and ultramafic rocks generally.
sentences.chinese: 黑雲母一般是鎂鐵質及超鎂鐵質岩石中的次要成分。

sentences.english: The rest of the things we buy are secondary.
sentences.chinese: 其他我們要買的都是次要的。

sentences.english: I’ll come back to this flip side a little later.
sentences.chinese: 我稍候將回過來再談一下這個次要的問題。

definition: whether or not (at the end of a phrase)
